page.title: 05LIFE STYLES
page.content: On a Saturday I normally get up at nine 0'clock.Most of the time my Dad's at work driving a bus so I don't see him until the afternoon.In the morning I have my breakfast and feed the Guinea pig.After that I go back to the house.On the way I go and see Grandad who lives next door.He gives me my 'Suzy' which is a comic.When I get home Mum is washing the dishes.While I have a wash Mum gets dressed then I make my bed.After that Mum does the hoovering and I watch the TV. After Mum has finished hoovering she has a cup of coffee and washes her hair.While my Mum washes her hair I do my Homework.Then Dad gets home and we have our dinner.Then Mum makes the dog's dinner while Dad gets changed.We go down a mucky path and through a sand quarry and back home.It's about half a mile.When I get home I normally
